author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Update `cmsenv_mpirun` to find `cmsenv_orted` both under `$CMSSW_BASE` and `$CMSSW_RELEASE_BASE`.

#### PR validation:

Tested using a CMSSW area with `cmsenv_orted` under `$CMSSW_RELEASE_BASE/bin/` and not under `$CMSSW_BASE/bin`.

#### If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported to CMSSW 12.4.x for ongoing DAQ tests (not used for data taking).
title: Update `cmsenv_mpirun` to work with `$CMSSW_RELEASE_BASE`
